RunCommandsOnlyWhenLive.label: Accept Commands Only When Live
RunCommandsOnlyWhenLive.tooltip: Indicates whether the script only accepts commands while you are live.

CommandName.label: Command Name
CommandName.tooltip: The command name is ! then whatever is in this box.

DisplayLimit.label: Queue Display Limit
DisplayLimit.tooltip: The maximum number of queued games that will be displayed with !communityqueue.

TwitchRewardNames.label: Redemption Names
TwitchRewardNames.tooltip: Specify the names of the Channel Point Redemptions that will trigger this event. Separate names with commas.

ReconnectionAttempts.label: Reconnection Attempts
ReconnectionAttempts.tooltip: The number times the script will attempt to reconnect when disconnected. Reconnections attempts happen once per minute.

HelpDisplayPermissions.label: Help Display Permissions
HelpDisplayPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to display the script help functions.

QueueDisplayPermissions.label: Queue Display Permissions
QueueDisplayPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to display the queue or Google Sheet link.

QueueFindPermissions.label: Queue Find Permissions
QueueFindPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Find subcommand to find a user in the queue.

QueueRemovePermissions.label: Queue Remove Permissions
QueueRemovePermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Remove subcommand to remove redemptions from the queue.

QueueAddPermissions.label: Queue Add Permissions
QueueAddPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Add subcommand to add redemptions to the queue.

QueueEditPermissions.label: Queue Edit Permissions
QueueEditPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Edit subcommand to edit existing redemptions in the queue.

GoogleUpdaterPermissions.label: Google Updater Manual Permissions
GoogleUpdaterPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Updater subcommand to manually start the GoogleSheetsUpdater.

VersionCheckPermissions.label: Version Check Permissions
VersionCheckPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Version subcommand to check for script updates.

UptimeDisplayPermissions.label: Uptime Display Permissions
UptimeDisplayPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Uptime subcommand to display the script's connectivity status.

ReconnectPermissions.label: Manual Reconnect Permissions
ReconnectPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Reconnect subcommand to attempt to reconnect the script to Twitch.

GistUploadPermissions.label: Manual Gist Upload Permissions
GistUploadPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use the Gist subcommand to upload the current log file to Crimdahl's Gist.

TwitchOAuthToken.label: Twitch oAuth Token
TwitchOAuthToken.tooltip: Enter an oAuth token that allows the bot to read channel point redemptions on the channel being watched.

btnGetToken.label: Get Token
btnGetToken.tooltip: Generate an oAuth Token for the watched twitch account with permissions to read channel point redemptions.

EnableGoogleSheets.label: Enable Google Sheets
EnableGoogleSheets.tooltip: Enable or disable updating a Google Sheet with your redemption information.

Sheet.label: Worksheet Name
Sheet.tooltip: Enter the sheet within your spreadsheet to modify.

DisplayMessageOnGameUnknown.label: If Game is Unknown, Display Redemption Message Instead
DisplayMessageOnGameUnknown.tooltip: When the value of Game is 'Unknown', display the value of Message instead.

EnableResponses.label: Enable Responses
EnableResponses.tooltip: Enable or disable bot responses to flag redemptions.

RetainLogFiles.label: Retain Logs Locally
RetainLogFiles.tooltip: Enable or disable the automatic deletion of log files.

AllowGistUpload.label: Allow Log Upload to Gist
AllowGistUpload.tooltip: Enable or disable the upload of the log file to Crimdahl's gist when the stream ends.

btnreadme.label: Open Readme
btnreadme._comment: Do not change the function name! Ever!!
